DOCNAME: CASE OF HASAN KAYA v. TURKEY
CONCLUSION: Violation of P1-1;Pecuniary damage - award;Costs and Expenses award (Convention proceedings);Costs and Expenses award (domestic proceedings)
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG Diyarbakır Il Özel GPE ) expropriated the plots of land belonging to the applicant in ORG . A committee of experts assessed the value of these plots of land and this amount was paid to the applicant when the expropriation took place .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant brought an action before ORG of First Instance , requesting increased compensation .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of First Instance awarded the applicant additional compensation of MONEY ( TRL ) ( MONEY ( ORG ) ) plus interest at the statutory rate applicable at the date of the court 's decision , running from DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the administration paid the applicant a total sum of TRL CARDINAL,CARDINAL,CARDINAL,CARDINAL ( MONEY ( ORG ) ) .
